column4: i just read a little article, what are the implications of DeviceKit replacing HAL?  The only responsibility HAL had that I was aware of was hotplugging usb devices and making those events available over dbus... obviously they're more, the scope of "hardware abstraction layer" is far greater than that... but yeah...
other than pain for packagers? Should be no difference; it's the same author upstream
interesting, so it's more or less a rewrite/reimplementation of HAL?
that's the impression I get; could be wrong. I know hughsie is driving part of it.
